import React, { Component, useState } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios'; import { Form, Button, Row, Col, InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../Form.css' class UserForm extends Component { api = Axios.create({ baseURL: 'http://192.168.10.39:5000/', timeout: 2000 }) btnDisabled = () => ( ) btnOn = () => { } state = { firstName: '', lastName: '', username: '', country: '', email: '', password: '', conf_pass: '', policies: '', gender: '', validated: false }; handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); } submitData = () => { this.api.post('register', this.state).then(result => { console.log(`Result on Post => ${result}`) console.log(`Result on Post => ${result.data}`) }).catch(err => console.log(err)) } handleChange = (e) => { // console.log(e.target.name, e.target.value); const { name, value } = e.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }); const form = e.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); } this.setState(true); } render() { let radios = { 'Male': 'male', 'Female': 'female', 'Other': 'others' } let radioBtn = Object.entries(radios).map(([key, value], i) => ( )); return (

{/* {JSON.stringify(this.state, null, 2)} */}
) } } export default UserForm
